presentation.title: 4 lakes
presentation.headline: Discover the trail along the 4 lakes
presentation.description: The tour of the village among lakes, hills and mountain villages. ~6h | ~4h

metaData.title: Discover the trail along the 4 lakes
metaData.description: The tour of the village among the Tarina, Taul Mare, Corna and Brazi lakes

specificArticles.textContent: This is the longer version of the 'Weather Station' trail. Start from Casa Petri and head through the 'Țarina' land, along the 'Țarini' lake until you reach the the Weather Station and 'Rotundu' Peak (the highest point from this trail). From here, on the left, you can see 'Tăul Mare' lake, which is our next destination. Head towards it and then climb up on the Lety and Șulei peaks. Take a break, enjoy the view and then continue to the 'Corna' Lake. Then return to the village by the 'Piatra Corbului' (Raven’s Stone) and 'Brazi' Lake.

seeAlso.text: You can find here the GPS data of the trail...
